verbose_text: Our results showed that phosphorylation of JAK2 (Tyr 1007/1008) was dose-dependently blocked by JSI-124 in HUVECs, indicating that the direct effects of JSI-124 on angiogenesis might be through inhibiting the VEGFR2 / STAT3 signaling pathway.
evidence: JAK2 (Tyr 1007/1008 ) was dose-dependently blocked by JSI-124 in HUVECs, indicating that the direct effects of JSI-124 on angiogenesis might be through inhibiting the VEGFR2
